alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Goodhue County through 145 PM CDT... At 115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stanton, or 9 miles east of Northfield, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stanton around 125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cannon Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
